title: Girl, Get Your Mind Right!
overview: Girl, Get Your Mind Right! is an MTV series-featuring author, blogger and relationship expert, Tionna Tee Smalls. Tionna's mission is to help girls get their minds right with any relationship or dating issue they may have. In each episode, Tionna works with one subject, finds out what their specific problem is and then guides them with her own set of key rules. With her tell-it-like-it-is approach, Tionna hopes to set her subjects straight and improve their love lives.
